import os;
from pyspark.sql import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
# from Mapplets import Mapplets
from pyspark import SparkContext;
from pyspark.sql.session import SparkSession


## Could not run below - as we cannot assign multple context.
# sc = SparkContext('local')
# spark = SparkSession(sc)

Src_AccountURL = 'etlmigpocadls'
Src_Container = 'etlmigpocdatalake'
Src_Path = '_StaleFiles'

Src_URL = 'abfss://{0}@{1}.dfs.core.windows.net/{2}/GLOBAL_CONFIG.parquet'.format(Src_Container, Src_AccountURL, Src_Path)
Tgt_URL = 'abfss://{0}@{1}.dfs.core.windows.net/{2}/Output/GLOBAL_CONFIG/'.format(Src_Container, Src_AccountURL, Src_Path)
print("Source URL : " + Src_URL)
print("Target URL : " + Tgt_URL)


### BB Output

# SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG = spark.read.jdbc(os.environ.get('DBConnection_ABC_CONNECT_STRING'), """(SELECT  '1'  from dual
# WHERE 1=0) QRY""", properties={'user': os.environ.get('DBConnection_ABC_LOGIN'), 'password': os.environ.get('DBConnection_ABC_PASSWORD'), 'driver': os.environ.get('ORACLE_DRIVER')}).withColumn("sys_row_id", monotonically_increasing_id())

# FLTR_ROW_REJECT = SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG.select( \
# 	.alias('SUCCESS_EMAILID') \
# ).filter("false").withColumn("sys_row_id", monotonically_increasing_id())


SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG = spark.read.format('parquet').load(Src_URL)
SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG.show()

FLTR_ROW_REJECT = SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG.filter(lower(SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG["SUCCESS_EMAILID"]) == "false")
FLTR_ROW_REJECT.show()



# sourcedf = spark.read.format("delta").load(sourcelocation)
# SQ_GLOBAL_CONFIG_path = spark.read.parquet('abfss://{0}@{1}/HC01/Handshake'.format(SourceContainer,SourceAccountURL)).first()[]

## Reading data from TargetFile
df = spark.read.format("delta").load(Tgt_URL)
df.show()
